basisSet.dc:title: aug-cc-pVTZ-PP
basisSet.dct:abstract: VTZPD Valence Triple Zeta + Polarization on All Atoms
basisSet.dc:description:
aug-cc-pVTZ-PP small-core relativistic PP correlation consistent basis sets ----------------------------------------------------------------------- Core Name Primitives Contractions Cu - Zn: 10 [Ne] ECP10MDF (11s,10p,9d,3f,2g) -> [6s,6p,5d,3f,2g] Ga - As: 10 [Ne] ECP10MDF (11s,12p,10d,2f) -> [6s,5p,4d,2f] Ag - Cd: 28 [Ar+3d] ECP28MDF (11s,10p,9d,3f,2g) -> [6s,6p,5d,3f,2g] In - Xe: 28 [Ar+3d] ECP28MDF (13s,12p,10d,2f) -> [6s,5p,4d,2f] Au - Hg: 60 [Kr+4d3f] ECP60MDF (11s,10p,9d,3f,2g) -> [6s,6p,5d,3f,2g] Tl - Rn: 60 [Kr+4d3f] ECP60MDF (13s,12p,9d,2f) -> [6s,5p,4d,2f]
Exponents from: --------------- Ga-As,In-Sb, Tl-Bi: K.A. Peterson, Systematically convergent basis sets with relativistic pseudopotentials. I. Correlation consistent basis sets for the post-d group 13 - 15 elements, J. Chem. Phys., 119, 11099 (2003).
Se-Kr, Te-Xe, Po-Rn: K.A. Peterson, D. Figgen, E. Goll, H. Stoll, and M. Dolg, Systematically convergent basis sets with relativistic pseudopotentials. II. Small-core pseudopotentials and correlation consistent basis sets for the post-d group 16 - 18 elements, J. Chem. Phys. 119, 11113 (2003).
Cu, Zn, Pd, Ag, Au, Hg: K.A. Peterson and C. Puzzarini, Theor. Chem. Acc., in press (2005)
PP parameters from: ------------------- Tl: B. Metz, M. Schweizer, H. Stoll, M. Dolg, W. Liu, Theor. Chem. Acc. 104, 22 (2000).
Ga-As, In-Sb, Pb-Bi: B. Metz, H. Stoll, M. Dolg, J. Chem. Phys. 113, 2563 (2000).
Se-Kr, Te-Xe, Po-Rn: K.A. Peterson, D. Figgen, E. Goll, H. Stoll, and M. Dolg, J. Chem. Phys. 119, 11113 (2003).
Cu, Zn, Pd, Ag, Au, Hg: D. Figgen, G. Rauhut, M. Dolg, and H. Stoll, Chem. Phys. 311, 227 (2005).
